Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供 DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造中的单个选择。

span.span: Provides a single choice within a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类类似于[\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素。This class is analogous to the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. 选择将按照它们在[\<有 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)元素中出现的顺序进行测试。Choices are tested in the order that they appear within a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element. 如果指定 `` 元素的 属性，则其值必须是 Machine.config 文件的 `` 部分中定义的设备筛选器的名称。If you specify the property of the `` element, its value must be the name of a device filter defined in the `` section of the Machine.config file. 在运行时，ASP.NET 根据当前设备的功能评估指定的设备筛选器。At run time, ASP.NET evaluates the specified device filter against the capabilities of the current device. 如果成功，则选择此选项。If successful, the choice is selected. 如果未指定 属性，则会选择 `` 元素的默认值。If you do not specify the property, the defaults for the `` element are selected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了图像中的 `` 元素。The following code example shows a `` element within an image. `Source` 特性将重写 控件的 属性。The `Source` attribute overrides the property of the control. 尽管该示例使用函数来确定浏览器是否需要 WML （`isWML11`）或支持颜色（`supportsColor`），但你可以改为使用 web.config 文件来定义 `` 元素，.NET Framework 会自动使用该元素来做出决定。Although the example uses functions to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`) or supports color (`supportsColor`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a `` element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果筛选器是比较筛选器，则使用 的值来替代 Web.config 中定义的参数值。如果 的值是方法（在页面上或在 web.config 所指向的程序集中）的名称，则 的值将作为参数提供给该方法。If the filter is a comparison filter, the value of is used in place of the argument value defined in Web.config. If the value of is the name of a method (either on the page or off in an assembly pointed to by Web.config), the value of is supplied as an argument to that method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理重写属性后更改此集合（在 方法中）不起作用。Changing this collection after overridden properties have been processed (in the method) has no effect. 此方法主要由控件设计器使用，不适合一般用途。This method is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general use.

summary.span: 获取或设置设备筛选器的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a device filter.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The name of a device filter.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器名称必须是页面上的方法的名称、关联的 `.ascx` 文件或 Web.config 的 `` 部分中定义的有效设备筛选器的名称。如果使用 属性指定方法名称，则该方法必须与以下原型匹配。The filter name must be the name of a method on the page, in the associated `.ascx` file, or the name of a valid device filter defined in the `` section of Web.config. If a method name is specified with the property, that method must match the following prototype. ``` public bool methodName(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument) ``` 例如，如果 属性设置为 `myChoiceMethod`，则必须存在具有以下签名的方法。For example, if the property was set to `myChoiceMethod`, a method with the following signature must exist. ``` public bool myChoiceMethod(System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities capabilities, String optionalArgument); ``` 计算[\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素时，将进行检查以确定页面上是否存在适当签名的方法。When evaluating the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element, a check is made to determine whether a method of the appropriate signature exists on the page. 否则，ASP.NET 将检查 Web.config 的 `` 部分。If not, ASP.NET checks the `` section of Web.config. > [!NOTE] > 设备筛选器区分大小写。Device filters are case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性主要由控件设计器使用，不适合一般的开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control designers and is not intended for general developer use. 值继承自包含控件或页。The value is inherited from the containing control or page.
